FETCH_USER_INFO_ERORR: Requested user data could not be found.
ERROR_IN_ADDING_USER: There is an error in adding user.
ERROR_IN_SIGN_UP: There is an error in signing up the user.

ERROR_IN_READING_RECIPIES_OF_USER: There is an error in reading recipes of current user.
